Tesla launches Shanghai megapack battery project - Chinese state mediaTesla on Friday launched its new megapack battery manufacturing project in Shanghai, according to Chinese state media. Fri, 22 Dec 2023 04:22:27 GMT PUH57DQE7JMCJMB77UVWNAHQX4 https://www.reuters.com/technology/tesla-launches-shanghai-megapack-battery-project-chinese-state-media-2023-12-22/Reuters技术
Boeing's first Dreamliner delivery to China since 2019 to land FridayBoeing's first direct delivery of a 787 Dreamliner to China since 2019 is set to land in Shanghai on Friday, a step that could hasten the end of China's freeze on deliveries of the firm's profitable 737 MAX after more than four years. Fri, 22 Dec 2023 04:20:08 GMT 4GO7P4I6PVNHVGW4557ALL https://www.reuters.com/business/aerospace-defense/boeings-first-dreamliner-delivery-china-since-2019-landed-friday-2023-12-22/Reuters商业航空航天与国防
Biting cold to loosen grip as temperatures to creep higher in ChinaAfter almost two weeks of below-freezing weather brought by a cold wave that swept through most of China, a round of warm air will begin to flow from the country's north to south lifting temperatures from the weekend. Fri, 22 Dec 2023 04:08:35 GMT IUZQJ26WNFKB5CZELO7U4TAAVQ https://www.reuters.com/world/china/biting-cold-loosen-grip-temporals-creep-higher-china-2023-12-22/Liz Lee世界中国
Hong Kong court rejects bid to drop sedition charge against Jimmy LaiA Hong Kong court on Friday rejected a bid by the legal team for pro-democracy tycoon Jimmy Lai to have sedition charge against him dropped, in a closely watched national security trial. Fri, 22 Dec 2023 03:26:15 GMT LILNRX3WH5J6TIIBMS4OXNLJZU https://www.reuters.com/world/china/hong-kong-court-rejects-bid-drop-sedition-charge-against-jimmy-lai-2023-12-22/Jessie Pang, Dorothy Kam世界中国
China’s automakers will defy the great uncouplingIt has become a truism that China and the United States are engaged in a great uncoupling. In strategically sensitive areas, from microchips to telecoms equipment, a wedge has already been driven between the two superpowers. But car companies – and specifically electric vehicles – could sketch out the limits of American protectionism. Fri, 22 Dec 2023 01:09:25 GMT M3JFNZZ6BNIPPJFEYHQBHYI2XE https://www.reuters.com/breakingviews/chinese-automakers-will-defy-great-uncoupling-2023-12-22/Jonathan Guilford突破性观点突发观点预测
US-China climate relations brace for US election, envoy changeThe U.S. and China have delivered big wins in climate diplomacy through the unique relationship of their chief climate envoys, but the two countries are bracing for change as the Chinese envoy retires and the U.S. readies for an election. Fri, 22 Dec 2023 01:04:14 GMT Q4RUDJ4TLNJSBB4GOPIV25ZCPQ https://www.reuters.com/sustainability/climate-energy/us-china-climate-relationships-brace-us-election-envoy-change-2023-12-22/Valerie Volcovici, David Stanway可持续发展缔约方大会第二十八届会议
